title: [ppc64le pytorch]  test_cpu (test_utils.TestFFI) fails
body_html:
test failing on ppc64le.

Could be related to #6913 that was merged 2 days ago

test_single_drop (test_utils.TestDataLoader) ... ok
test_single_keep (test_utils.TestDataLoader) ... ok
test_cpu (test_utils.TestFFI) ... terminate called after throwing an instance of 'std::runtime_error'
what(): invalid argument 1: expected 3D tensor at /home/jenkins/pytorch/aten/src/TH/generic/THTensorMath.cpp:2230
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "test/run_test.py", line 354, in
main()
File "test/run_test.py", line 346, in main
raise RuntimeError(message)
RuntimeError: test_utils failed! Received signal: SIGIOT
[pytorch-linux-cuda9-cudnn7-py3-build-test-gpu] $ /bin/bash +x /tmp/jenkins3467137355149778967.sh
Exited with exit status 1
[pytorch-linux-cuda9-cudnn7-py3-build-test-gpu] $ /bin/sh -xe /tmp/jenkins7824832211748384455.sh
[pytorch-linux-cuda9-cudnn7-py3-build-test-gpu] $ /bin/sh -xe /tmp/jenkins7294624988814926094.sh
Build step 'Run job on SGE' marked build as failure
Finished: FAILURE

body:
test failing on ppc64le.   

Could be related to #6913  that was merged 2 days ago

test_single_drop (test_utils.TestDataLoader) ... ok
test_single_keep (test_utils.TestDataLoader) ... ok
test_cpu (test_utils.TestFFI) ... terminate called after throwing an instance of 'std::runtime_error'
  what():  invalid argument 1: expected 3D tensor at /home/jenkins/pytorch/aten/src/TH/generic/THTensorMath.cpp:2230
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test/run_test.py", line 354, in <module>
    main()
  File "test/run_test.py", line 346, in main
    raise RuntimeError(message)
RuntimeError: test_utils failed! Received signal: SIGIOT
[pytorch-linux-cuda9-cudnn7-py3-build-test-gpu] $ /bin/bash +x /tmp/jenkins3467137355149778967.sh
Exited with exit status 1
[pytorch-linux-cuda9-cudnn7-py3-build-test-gpu] $ /bin/sh -xe /tmp/jenkins7824832211748384455.sh
[pytorch-linux-cuda9-cudnn7-py3-build-test-gpu] $ /bin/sh -xe /tmp/jenkins7294624988814926094.sh
Build step 'Run job on SGE' marked build as failure
Finished: FAILURE
